00018 //
00019 // File:   moo_oeralp.cc
00020 // calculates overlap integrals for molecular orbitals using libmoo
00021 // moo_overlap --pos1 <coordinate file for mol1>
00022 //                      --pos2 <coordinate file for mol2>
00023 //                      --conjseg <xml file defining conjugated segments>
00024 //                      --pdb geometry in which electronic coupling si calculated
00025 
00026 #include <boost/program_options.hpp>
00027 #include <string>
00028 #include <votca/moo/jcalc.h>
00029 #include <votca/moo/crgunit.h>
00030 #include <votca/tools/application.h>
00031 
00032 using namespace std;
00033 using namespace votca::moo;
00034 
00035 class MOOApplication
00036         : public Application
00037 {
00038 public:
00039             virtual string ProgramName() { return "moo_overlap"; }
00040             virtual void HelpText(std::ostream &out) { };
00041             void Initialize();
00042             bool EvaluateOptions();
00043             void Run(void);
00044 protected:              
00045             string _conjseg, _pos1, _pos2, _pdbfile;
00046 };
00047 
00048 void MOOApplication::Initialize()
00049 {
00050         // read in program options
00051         namespace po = boost::program_options;
00052         AddProgramOptions("MOO Options")
00053                 ("conjseg", po::value<string>(), " xml file describing two conjugated segments")
00054                 ("pos1", po::value<string>(), " position and orientation of molecule 1")
00055                 ("pos2", po::value<string>(), " position and orientation of molecule 2")                
00056                 ("pdb", po::value<string>()->default_value("geometry.pdb"), " pdb file of two molecules")               
00057                 ; 
00058 }
00059 
00060 bool MOOApplication::EvaluateOptions()
00061 {
00062         CheckRequired("conjseg");
00063          _conjseg = OptionsMap()["conjseg"].as<string>();
00064          _pos1 = OptionsMap()["pos1"].as<string>();
00065          _pos2 = OptionsMap()["pos2"].as<string>();
00066          _pdbfile = OptionsMap()["pdb"].as<string>();
00067         return true;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void MOOApplication::Run(void)
00071 {
00072         //cout << "Reading Crg unit Types" << endl;
00073         JCalc jcalc(_conjseg);
00074         //cout << "Finished reading Crg unit Types" << endl;
00075 
00076         ifstream in1(_pos1.c_str());
00077         ifstream in2(_pos2.c_str());
00078         int written=0;
00079         while (in1 && in2) {
00080             string name1, name2;
00081             vec com1;
00082             vec com2;
00083             matrix or1;
00084             matrix or2;
00085             in1 >> name1 >> com1.x() >> com1.y() >> com1.z() >>
00086                     or1[0][0] >> or1[0][1] >> or1[0][2] >>
00087                     or1[1][0] >> or1[1][1] >> or1[1][2] >>
00088                     or1[2][0] >> or1[2][1] >> or1[2][2];
00089             in2 >> name2 >> com2.x() >> com2.y() >> com2.z() >>
00090                     or2[0][0] >> or2[0][1] >> or2[0][2] >>
00091                     or2[1][0] >> or2[1][1] >> or2[1][2] >>
00092                     or2[2][0] >> or2[2][1] >> or2[2][2];
00093 
00094             if (!in1 || !in2) break;
00095             //  cout << "mol1: " << name1 << com1 << or1<<endl;
00096             //  cout << "mol2: " << name2 << com2 << or2<<endl;
00097 
00098 
00099             CrgUnit * A = jcalc.CreateCrgUnit(0, name1);
00100             CrgUnit * B = jcalc.CreateCrgUnit(1, name2);
00101             A->SetPos(0, com1);
00102             B->SetPos(0, com2);
00103             A->SetNorm(0, or1[2]);
00104             A->SetPlane(0, or1[1]);
00105             B->SetNorm(0, or2[2]);
00106             B->SetPlane(0, or2[1]);
00107 
00108 
00109            //write pdb file
00110            mol_and_orb *molecule = ( A -> rotate_translate_beads() );
00111            (*molecule).write_pdb(_pdbfile, "m1", written);
00112            written += (*molecule).getN();
00113            delete molecule;
00114            molecule = ( B -> rotate_translate_beads() );
00115            (*molecule).write_pdb(_pdbfile, "m2", written);
00116            written += (*molecule).getN();
00117            delete molecule;
00118            ofstream fl;
00119            fl.open(_pdbfile.c_str(), ios::app);
00120            fl.setf(ios::fixed);
00121            fl << "END" <<endl;
00122 
00123            
00124             //  cout << "Compute J" <<endl;
00125             vector <double> Js = jcalc.CalcJ(*A, *B);
00126             //  cout << "Finished computing J" <<endl;
00127             vector <double>::iterator itJ = Js.begin();
00128             for (; itJ != Js.end(); ++itJ) cout << '\t' << *itJ << endl;
00129         };
00130 }
00131 
00132 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00133 {
00134         MOOApplication app;
00135         return app.Exec(argc, argv);
00136 }
